32#ifndef _LINUX_RCUPDATE_H_
33#define _LINUX_RCUPDATE_H_
34
35#include <sys/atomic.h>
36#include <sys/cdefs.h>
37#include <sys/systm.h>
38
39#define __rcu
40
41#define rcu_assign_pointer(P, V) do { \
42 membar_producer(); \
43 (P) = (V); \
44} while (0)
45
46#define rcu_dereference(P) ({ \
47 typeof(*(P)) *__rcu_dereference_tmp = (P); \
48 membar_datadep_consumer(); \
49 __rcu_dereference_tmp; \
50})
51
52#define rcu_dereference_protected(P, C) ({ \
53 WARN_ON(!(C)); \
54 (P); \
55})
56
57struct rcu_head {
58 void (*rcuh_callback)(struct rcu_head *);
59 struct rcu_head *rcuh_next;
60};
61
62#define call_rcu linux_call_rcu
63#define synchronize_rcu linux_synchronize_rcu
64
65int linux_rcu_gc_init(void);
66void linux_rcu_gc_fini(void);
67
68void call_rcu(struct rcu_head *, void (*)(struct rcu_head *));
69void synchronize_rcu(void);
70
71static inline void
72rcu_read_lock(void)
73{
74
75 kpreempt_disable();
76 __insn_barrier();
77}
78
79static inline void
80rcu_read_unlock(void)
81{
82
83 __insn_barrier();
84 kpreempt_enable();
85}
86
87#endif /* _LINUX_RCUPDATE_H_ */
88
